Articles.Content:
I've been playing quite a bit of Magic The Gathering: Arena recently thanks to the LOTR crossover bringing me back, and I'm always looking for more people to play with! I figured that I'd make a thread for people to share their in game ID and preferred game modes with others just in case there were fellow players here!

 

ID: Arkantos97#78526

Preferred Modes: Historic Brawl, Commander, Standard
